name: Kithuruwan Vithanage
bio: Kasun Disi Kithuruwan Vithanage (Sinhala: කිතුරුවන් විතානගේ)  (born February 1991 in Colombo), or commonly Kithuruwan Vithanage, is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer who plays for all forms of the game in international level.[1] He is a Left-hand batsman and legbreak bowler.[2]
